items.text: Uncover proof of Appinventiv's impact across 3000+ digital deliveries for 35+ industries.
Uncover proof of Appinventiv's impact across 3000+ digital deliveries for 35+ industries.

heroSection.heading: Engineering Global Digital Disruption with AI-Native Solutions
heroSection.description: We are a Deloitte Technology Fast 50 company and a Clutch Global Award 2025 winner for unmatched customer excellence. Our mission is to leverage AI-driven automation and strategic innovation to craft digital solutions that not only meet but anticipate your business needs, ensuring sustainable market leadership.

statsSection.title: Transforming Businesses with AI-Driven Technology That Transcends Geographies and Platforms
statsSection.description: Appinventiv is one of the world's largest AI-led IT service providers helping companies redefine their digital possibilities for nearly a decade now. With our team of 1600+ tech evangelists, we are building the digital infrastructure of our clients using intelligent, AI-native solutions, positioning them to be the market leaders of their respective industries.

stats.title: Industries Mastered
stats.description: With our agility & engineering expertise, we equip your critical business functions with customized tech, and expand digital capabilities.

stats.title: Tech Evangelists
stats.description: We are a dynamic team of certified cloud architects, data scientists, and AI/ML specialists passionately driven to achieve the best results for our clients.

stats.title: AI Models Deployed
stats.description: From predictive analytics to generative AI, we've implemented intelligent models that drive measurable ROI.

stats.title: Solutions Designed And Delivered
stats.description: We have empowered businesses with thousands of successful futuristic and AI-augmented solutions that have helped them grow and scale.

stats.title: Legacy Processes Transformed
stats.description: We help businesses achieve their digital transformation goals by seamlessly integrating advanced technologies into their legacy systems.

stats.title: Strategic Federal Partnerships
stats.description: We drive collaborative initiatives that address critical challenges and deliver impactful solutions.

testimonialSection.heading: Our Clients Are Our Superheroes. We Prioritize Delivering Excellent Products, Thorough Training, And Optimal Execution

servicesSection.title: Navigate the Digital Frontier with Our Engineering Excellence

items.title: AI Development Services
items.description: We engineer bespoke AI solutions, from Large Language Models (LLMs) to Machine Learning (ML) applications, helping you explore new opportunities for automation, insights, and innovation.

items.title: Mobile App Development
items.description: We build intelligent mobile apps with Generative UX Design and AI-Powered Personalization to enhance user engagement.

items.title: Software Development
items.description: From custom development to system upgrades, we ensure AI-Native Development and an AI-Augmented SDLC to craft software that enhances operational efficiency and drives innovation.

items.title: Digital Transformation
items.description: We help businesses stay competitive by transforming legacy systems with AI-driven automation, modern digital-first solutions, and Intelligent Process Automation.

items.title: Ideation And Design Strategy
items.description: Our strategic ideation and design processes, powered by AI-Driven Market Analysis and Generative Design, ensure that your digital products are not only functional but also deeply resonate with users.

items.title: IT Consulting
items.description: We provide expert IT consulting services supported by AI-Powered IT Strategy and Predictive Analytics to help your organization navigate complex technology decisions and align IT strategies with business objectives.

items.title: DevOps
items.description: Our DevOps services streamline development and operations to accelerate your project timelines and improve overall product quality through intelligent automation and proactive insights.

items.title: Cloud Managed Services
items.description: We manage your cloud infrastructure end-to-end, using AI-Optimized Cloud Management and AIOps to ensure it is optimized, secure, and cost-effective; allowing you to focus on strategic business activities.

items.label: EFFICIENCY
items.title: Automate Processes
items.description: Cut operational costs by up to **30%** with AI-driven workflow automation.

items.label: GROWTH
items.title: Personalize Experiences
items.description: Increase customer LTV (lifetime value) by **25%** through ML-powered personalization.

items.label: INNOVATION
items.title: Accelerate Discovery
items.description: Reduce R&D cycles by **50%** using Generative AI for prototyping and simulation.

innovationSection.title: We Create New Solutions and Transform Existing Ones with Technologies That Beat Industry-Best Timelines

items.title: Artificial Intelligence
items.description: We leverage AI to craft intelligent solutions that streamline operations and enhance decision-making capabilities.

items.title: Generative AI
items.description: We utilize Generative AI technology to create solutions that produce new content, automate creative processes and enhance user experiences.

items.title: Machine Learning
items.description: We use ML to build intelligent systems that analyze data patterns and predict outcomes while continuously improving operations.

items.description: We employ computer vision to analyze visual data, automate image processing tasks and enhance the accuracy and speed of visual recognition systems.

solutionsSection.title: Solving Your Biggest Business Challenges with Advanced Technologies

items.title: Market Forecasting & Risk Reduction
items.description: Sales forecasts miss the mark, new products fail, and market entry feels like expensive guessing. AI and predictive analytics give you realistic demand forecasts based on actual market data. One retail client cut inventory waste by 40%.

items.title: Legacy System Modernization
items.description: IT changes take months, integrations break constantly, and systems hold back growth. Smart automation targets your biggest operational headaches without expensive replacements. Saved a manufacturer $2.3M annually.

items.title: Smart Manufacturing
items.description: Human inspections miss defects. AI-enabled quality checks improve speed and accuracy while reducing costs. One client cut inspection times by 60%.

faqs.question: What mobile app development services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We provide end-to-end mobile app development including design, development, testing, and deployment.

faqs.question: What software development services do you offer?
faqs.answer:
With a dedicated team of developers, we offer
  • Software Consulting
  • Custom Software Development
  • Enterprise Software Development
  • API Development

faqs.question: What is the average cost and timeline for developing a mobile app?
faqs.answer: The cost and timeline depend on complexity, features, and platform. A typical project may take 2–6 months.

faqs.question: How do you ensure the security and quality of the software you develop?
faqs.answer: We follow industry best practices, code reviews, automated testing, and secure deployment strategies.

faqs.question: Do you offer app maintenance and support services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide ongoing maintenance, updates, and support to ensure smooth operation.

faqs.question: Do you assist with software integration and data migration?
faqs.answer: Yes, we handle software integrations, legacy migrations, and third-party API connections.
